name: taskme
0:
”Alexa, task me”
”Can I have a different one?”
”On it.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task me
des:
Task Me provides random, fun challenges. Most can be done from home, with items you already have at home. Do the task on your own, or compete with family and friends. Whichever you choose, use #taskme to post your work on social media and to see how others did it!

To start, just say "Alexa, task me.” 

You can also ask Alexa to repeat the task, or to give you a different one. 

Say “on it,” to accept the challenge.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop.”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
